mapper.select: SELECT su.id, su.username, su.password, su.nickname, su.remark, su.post_ids, su.email, su.mobile, su.sex, su.avatar, su.status, su.login_ip, su.login_date, su.create_time, sd.id as deptId, sd.name as deptName, sd.parent_id as parentId FROM system_users su LEFT JOIN system_user_dept sud ON su.id=sud.user_id and sud.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN system_dept sd ON sud.dept_id=sd.id and sd.deleted = 0 WHERE su.id = #{id} and su.deleted = 0 ORDER BY su.id DESC
